metadata.title: CVE-2018-12641 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in arm_pt in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.30. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++demangling functions provided by libiberty, and there are recursive stackframes: demangle_arm_hp_template, demangle_class_name, demangle_fund_type,do_type, do_arg, demangle_args, and demangle_nested_args. This can occurduring execution of nm-new.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
